casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY CASES

2003-1228. In re Application of Bagne.

On May 12, 2004, the court ordered that the application of applicant be disapproved and that he could reapply for the February 2005 bar examination. On April 8, 2005, applicant filed a motion for relief from judgment. Upon consideration thereof,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion of applicant be, and hereby is, denied. It is further ordered that applicant may reapply to take the Ohio bar examination.

Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents and would grant the motion.
